articles.content: The banner, reading 'White Lives Matter Burnley', was seen trailing a plane flown over Manchester City's Etihad stadium on Monday, shortly after players and officials has taken a knee in support of t… [+2379 chars]

articles.title: Murray makes winning return criticises Djokovic after positive coronavirus tests - ESPN
articles.description: Andy Murray criticised world No.1 Novak Djokovic for staging the Adria Tour tournament without adopting any precautions after the Serbian and three other players tested positive for the coronavirus.
